Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! 

I saw several people post pics of their Lego Saturn V build, and figured I'd throw my hat in the ring. 

Got the kit for my birthday a couple of days ago, wanted to share. 

Album: https://imgur.com/a/TB8T0

I was very pleased overall with the staging and the outside look. The rocket has a nice heft to it and is very solid. The lunar module fits nicly in the provided fairing, and the service module engine as well. It is very accurate to the original. 

I did not like the command and service modules themselves. They were too plain and didnt fit in with the rest of the craft. The provided CM was also plain white with no printing, but the "landed" one in the ocean scene had printing. 

Overall, it was a great build and a lot of fun!
